result.title: Can't solve problem :(
result.content:
Hi!

I can't solve this –∑problem. My code:


#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int a, b;
  cin >> a >> b;
  int ans = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < a; i++) ans++;
  for (int i = 0; i < b; i++) ans++;
  cout << ans << endl;
  return 0;
}

Please help
